column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////When we were finally seated
column2: we had a hard time getting someone to take our order. Another party that had been seated around the time that we had were already starting to eat their tapas
column3: and we still didn't have anyone come up to our table. I eventually had to let someone know that we were ready to take our order in order to get a waiter to our table.
